summary: The diff adds a localStorage-backed zoom preference, a shared Google Maps URL builder, and updates LastKnownLocationCard to include a zoom parameter. MeetupPage shows imports for the zoom control and URL/preference utilities, but the truncated diff does not provide evidence that the control is rendered in the required panel or that MeetupPage map links are actually generated with the preferred zoom.

missing_requirements.requirement: A zoom control is available in the UI where map links are shown (at minimum on the Meetup location result panel).
missing_requirements.reason: A MapZoomControl component was added and imported into MeetupPage, but the provided (truncated) MeetupPage diff does not show it being rendered in the location result panel where map links are shown.

missing_requirements.requirement: MeetupPage map link(s) include the zoom parameter and reflect the user-selected zoom value (or default if unset).
missing_requirements.reason: MeetupPage imports buildGoogleMapsUrl and getMapZoomPreference, but the truncated diff does not include the actual map link generation/anchor href showing use of the zoom parameter.

hallucinated_features.description: Added extra preference-management helpers (clearMapZoomPreference, getDefaultZoom, getZoomRange) beyond the stated requirements.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only asks to persist and reuse a preferred zoom with a sensible default; it does not request a clear/reset function or explicit range/default accessors (though they may be reasonable internal additions).
